column2: This privacy policy may be modified from time to time. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes to this privacy policy and other places we deem appropriate. We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please periodically review it.

If, at anytime in the future, Tulsaworld.com decides to use information provided by you in a way not described here, we will contact you beforehand to explain the use of the information and give you the opportunity to decline that use.
